body:
Add info for perl@5.22.0.

One of our groups needs 5.22.0 and we can't convince them otherwise.

That version doesn't build cleanly without a patch, resurrected from the Perl issue tracker.

Built and lightly tested on CentOS 7.

Credit (and blame :smile) to @peetsv, I'm just tossing this over the wall.
title: Packages/perl add old version
